commit.message:
re PR libfortran/22570 (Null Characters instead of blanks in text output.)

2005-07-22 Jerry DeLisle <jvdelisle@verizon.net>

	PR libfortran/22570
	* io/unit.c (init_units): Replace BLANK_ZERO with
	BLANK_UNSPECIFIED.

From-SVN: r102288

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2005-07-22 Jerry DeLisle <jvdelisle@verizon.net>
+
+	PR libfortran/22570
+	* io/unit.c (init_units): Replace BLANK_ZERO with
+	BLANK_UNSPECIFIED.
+
 2005-07-22 Jerry DeLisle <jvdelisle@verizon.net>
 
 	PR libfortran/21875  (FM111.f)
